hero.title1: In our world, we create success stories beyond the ordinary—blending passion and creativity to refine ideas and turn them into reality.
hero.title2: We don’t offer conventional programs; we offer passion-led journeys that carry you toward your professional dreams.
hero.title3: Core isn’t just a place to work—it’s a complete entrepreneurship community.
hero.title4: Core Istanbul, the largest Turkish–Arab hub for entrepreneurship.
hero.subtitle: CORE is a home for passionate founders, professionals, and learners. We combine mentorship, community, and real-world projects to help you grow faster than you thought possible.

footer.title: Home of Passion
footer.newsletterTitle: Stay up to date with the latest news from Core Istanbul
footer.newsletterNote: By registering to receive email messages, you agree to our privacy policy. Unsubscribe at any time.

aboutSection.title: About Core Istanbul
aboutSection.body: A global organization founded by a select group of young people, supported by business leaders and international organizations from within and outside Türkiye. Headquartered in Istanbul, with branches in Iraq and Syria, it seeks to create an integrated entrepreneurship community within a youth-driven environment that inspires creativity and innovation, supported by a network of experts and investors.

servicesSection.title: Our Services
servicesSection.subtitle: Core Istanbul business hub offers programs for developing the entrepreneurship community and startups to transfer ideas into market.

program.title: Entrepreneurship Program
program.body: A structured program that helps young people turn their ideas into real startups through mentorship, training, and hands-on projects.

corePro.title: Core Pro
corePro.body: Specialized workshops and events designed to equip Arab youth in Turkey with essential market skills, led by experienced professionals from major companies.

workspace.title: Shared Workspace
workspace.body: A modern co-working space that offers a productive environment, community, and networking opportunities for entrepreneurs and teams.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.body: Professional consulting tailored to the needs of early-stage projects and startups.

card1.title: Launch of the First Incubation Program Application Form
card1.body: Now you can start turning your idea into a real project operating in the market...

card2.title: Core Istanbul Hosts New Entrepreneurship Workshop
card2.body: A full-day workshop designed to equip young founders with practical tools and mentoring.

card3.title: New Partnerships with Regional Organizations
card3.body: Core Istanbul expands its network to bring more opportunities and support for youth projects.

card4.title: Demo Day for Startup Cohort
card4.body: Graduating teams present their projects to investors and ecosystem partners at Core Istanbul.

testimonials.title: Testimonials

yassen.quote: This initiative is not limited to Turkey or Istanbul only, but will become a global model of work and initiative.

saad.quote: Core Istanbul is a great monumental work; this group knows no impossibilities. Faith, ambition, hard work, patience and learning open the horizons of the universe.

jammal.quote: We urge the private sector to support this pioneering project for its importance in providing job opportunities and breaking the cycle of poverty.

items.graduates: Graduates of Vocational & Technical Training Programs

hero.title: Who we are
hero.body: A global organization founded by a group of young people with support from business leaders and international organizations inside and outside Turkey. Headquartered in Istanbul with branches in Iraq and Syria, we aim to build an integrated entrepreneurship community within a youth-driven environment that inspires creativity and innovation—supported by a network of experts and investors.

vision.title: Vision
vision.body: A leading hub for Arab entrepreneurship in Turkey, with incubators, accelerators, and an investor network across the Middle East and North Africa.

mission.title: Mission
mission.body: Contributing to the creation of Arab startups and entrepreneurs who support the economic revival of their communities, and encouraging the spirit of innovation and entrepreneurial initiative among Arab youth.

corePro.title: Technical & Vocational Qualification
corePro.body:
• Empowers youth with essential vocational and technical skills demanded by the job market.
• Focuses on hands-on, practical training across diverse fields.
• Aims to boost work readiness and improve employment opportunities.

coreAcademy.title: Advanced Technical & Vocational Qualification
coreAcademy.body:
• Offers advanced specialized programs aligned with modern sectors.
• Focuses on cutting-edge technologies and high-level competencies.
• Prepares talents to compete in local and regional markets.

coreVentures.title: Entrepreneurship
coreVentures.body:
• Supports entrepreneurs in turning ideas into scalable ventures.
• Provides incubation, acceleration, and business model development programs.
• Helps build sustainable startups with real economic impact.

corePodcast.title: Core Talk Podcast
corePodcast.body:
• A knowledge platform highlighting entrepreneurship, innovation, and success stories.
• Hosts experts and founders to share real-world experience.
• Spreads awareness and inspires an entrepreneurial culture.

coreIntern.title: Internship & Training
coreIntern.body:
• Provides practical internships and professional immersion inside companies and institutions.
• Connects beneficiaries with the labor market through direct experience.
• Helps bridge the gap between education and real work.

coreConsulting.title: Shared Workspace
coreConsulting.body:
• A flexible, well-equipped working environment for entrepreneurs and freelancers.
• Encourages collaboration, knowledge exchange, and professional networking.
• Supports productivity and innovation within a complete entrepreneurial community.

gallery.title: Photo Library
gallery.subtitle: A glimpse of our programs, trainings, and shared workspace.

entrepreneurship.title: Entrepreneurship Program
entrepreneurship.description: Core Istanbul Business Hub has specialized programs in developing the entrepreneurship community and startups.

incubation.description: Incubation programs for startups that transform them from ideas into market-ready companies capable of achieving breakthroughs, connecting them with experts and investors.

acceleration.description: Acceleration programs for startups in the market to develop their operations and expansions to gain larger market shares, connecting them with experts and investors.

investors.description: A network of investors from within and outside Türkiye ready to invest in promising startups.

events.description: Conferences and meetings that bring together startups with investors and market experts to build strong relationships and successful investment opportunities.

incubation.intro: Incubation programs for startups play a pioneering role in achieving economic empowerment for youth in the Arab world. Today, they are considered among the most important tools for mobilizing resources, linking them with opportunities and investment, and subsequently economic development.
incubation.title: The first program of its kind in Turkey
incubation.description: The incubation program for startups launched by Core Istanbul is the first of its kind in Turkey, targeting 20 startups (Turkish – Arab). Over 6 months, it works on their development with market experts, then connects them with investors and continues with them to achieve market breakthroughs and success.
incubation.imgAlt: Startup incubation program at Core Istanbul

incubationStages.title: Incubation Program Stages
incubationStages.subtitle: Core Istanbul Business Hub offers advanced programs specialized in vocational training.

application.title: Application for Incubation
application.description: This stage aims to attract incubable projects through an electronic form that helps us understand the project idea and the founders. Then, 50 projects are selected from the submitted ones to advance to the second stage of entering Core Istanbul’s incubation.

camp.title: Training Camp
camp.description: A two-day training camp includes intensive training to complete the presentations to be shown to the judging panel, in order to filter them down to 20 projects that will enter the incubation program.

incubation.title: Incubation
incubation.description: A comprehensive six-month incubation program that includes intensive workshops to help project owners prepare their business model and get ready for market entry.

judging.title: Final Judging Day
judging.description: Projects present their final presentations to the judging panel to announce the winning, investable projects.

post.title: Post-Incubation
post.description: Core Istanbul connects successful graduating projects with its network of investors while continuing to provide advisory and guidance support.

applicationPrograms.subtitle: Core Istanbul Business Hub offers advanced programs specialized in vocational training.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Core Istanbul business hub offers advanced programs specialized in vocational training.

whatIsIncubation.a: An incubation program is an educational or social initiative aimed at supporting vulnerable or needy individuals or groups by providing support and assistance. This support can include guidance, training, financial aid, or any other type of assistance designed to help individuals improve and develop in their lives or in a specific field.

youthBenefit.q: How can youth benefit from an incubation program?
youthBenefit.a: Youth can benefit from an incubation program by receiving advice, training, financial support, networking opportunities, and inspiration to develop their skills and achieve their goals.

howToRegister.q: How can I register for an incubation program?
howToRegister.a: You can usually register for an incubation program by contacting the organizing body directly or through their website if this option is available.

isFree.a: The cost policies for incubation programs vary based on the organizing institution and its available resources. Some incubation programs may be completely free for participants, while others may charge a nominal fee or participation costs.

criteria.q: What are the admission criteria for the program?
criteria.a: Admission criteria include interest and motivation, qualifications and experience, commitment, merit, and alignment with the program's goals and values.

balanceStudy.q: Can I balance between my studies or work with an incubation program?
balanceStudy.a: Yes, incubation programs often offer flexibility for participants to balance their studies or work alongside participating in the program. Sessions may be organized to fit participants' schedules, and there may be options for remote participation or flexible timings.

vocationalHero.title: We design unique, innovative experiences beyond traditional programs
vocationalHero.subtitle: Core Pro is a vocational training experience that connects youth with real market opportunities through expert-led programs and hands-on practice.

vocationalIntro.title: Core Istanbul business hub offers advanced programs specialized in vocational training
vocationalIntro.subtitle: Core Pro designs structured learning journeys that blend technical skills with real business exposure.
vocationalIntro.tagline: Targeting Turkish - Arab - foreign youth in Turkey

empoweringYouth.title: Empowering Youth
empoweringYouth.heading: Core focuses on empowering youth with market-ready skills across various sectors
empoweringYouth.body: These programs are designed and delivered by expert trainers and professionals from leading companies to build job capacities that contribute to modern economic development.
empoweringYouth.imgAlt: Young participants in a vocational training workshop

trainingFields.title: Training Fields
trainingFields.subtitle: Core Istanbul business hub offers specialized training fields and practical programs to build in-demand skills.

vocationalStages.title: Core Pro Stages
vocationalStages.subtitle: A structured journey that moves youth from training into real employment opportunities.

recruitTrainers.title: Recruiting expert trainers in the market
recruitTrainers.description: Selecting specialized trainers and practitioners from leading companies to design and deliver the program.

recruitYouth.title: Reaching targeted Arab youth
recruitYouth.description: Announcing and promoting the program, screening applications, and selecting motivated participants to join.

implementProgram.title: Implementing the training program
implementProgram.description: Delivering the vocational training program through interactive workshops, projects, and practical assignments.

employment.title: Employment and networking
employment.description: Supporting graduates with job matching, internships, and networking opportunities with partner companies.

vocationalFaq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

whatIsProgram.q: What is the Vocational Training Program?
whatIsProgram.a: The Vocational Training Program is an educational or training program designed to equip individuals with the skills and knowledge necessary to competently practice a particular profession. These programs are designed to meet the needs of the labor market and industry requirements, and are often offered through educational institutions or specialized training centers.

youthBenefit.q: How can young people benefit from the Vocational Training Program?
youthBenefit.a: Young people can benefit from the Vocational Training Program by gaining skills, improving job opportunities, preparing for professional challenges, building a network of relationships, and defining a career path.

howToRegister.q: How can I register for the Vocational Training Program?
howToRegister.a: You can register for the Vocational Training Program by filling out the registration form and submitting the required documents to the program provider.

isFree.a: Whether the Vocational Training Program is free or requires fees depends on the policy of the program provider. Some programs may be completely free while others may require registration fees or training costs.

criteria.q: What are the admission criteria for the program?
criteria.a: The admission criteria for the Vocational Training Program vary depending on the program provider and the required specialization, and may include minimum education, required professional experience, passing evaluation tests, or personal interviews.

balance.q: Can I balance my studies or work with the Vocational Training Program?
balance.a: Yes, in many cases, you can balance your current studies or work with the Vocational Training Program, depending on your personal arrangements and the flexibility of the program and the provider. Some institutions offer training programs at flexible times, such as evenings or online, allowing you to balance study and work.

vocationalFaq.ctaText: Do you have another question? Send it here.

coreProPage.title: Programs
coreProPage.subtitle: Specialized programs that empower youth with practical skills and entrepreneurial pathways.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.desc: We’re preparing this program. Check back soon for full details.

vocational.title: Technical & Vocational Qualification Programs
vocational.about: Intensive technical and vocational training programs designed to empower youth and new graduates to develop their career path. The program runs for 2 months (120 hours) of training and mentoring. It starts by studying market and company needs, then building the curriculum with experts, followed by training, and ends with linking graduates to companies and employment.

testimonials.name: Noor Bas Oghlo
testimonials.text: What I learned at Core, I didn’t learn in 4 years at university.

testimonials.name: Hussein Al-Hussein
testimonials.text: What we studied at Core developed our skills... (etc.)

entrepreneurship.title: Entrepreneurship Programs
entrepreneurship.about: Core Istanbul has a specialized program to develop the entrepreneurship ecosystem and startups. It aims to build startups capable of overcoming challenges and achieving success to enhance youth economic empowerment. The program lasts 6 months: we recruit and train participants to develop their ideas and projects, then connect them with Core’s investor network to attract investment and enter the market.
includes: Incubation programs that transform startups from ideas into market-ready companies, connected to experts and investors.
Acceleration programs for existing startups to improve operations and expand to capture larger market share, connected to experts and investors.
An investor network inside and outside Turkey ready to invest in startups.
Conferences, meetups, and specialized events to grow the entrepreneurship community and connect stakeholders.

stages.title: 1) Apply
stages.desc: Attract incubatable projects via an online form to understand the idea and founders, then select 50 projects to move to the next stage.

stages.title: 2) Bootcamp
stages.desc: A 2-day intensive bootcamp to finalize pitch decks and present to the jury, filtering to 20 projects that enter incubation.

stages.title: 3) Incubation
stages.desc: A full 6-month incubation program with intensive workshops to build business models and prepare for market entry.

stages.title: 4) Final Demo Day
stages.desc: Projects deliver final pitches to the jury to announce investment-ready winners.

stages.title: 5) Post-incubation
stages.desc: Core connects successful graduates with its investor network and continues advisory and mentoring support.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Core Istanbul Space?
whyChoose.subtitle: Core Istanbul offers a creative and integrated work environment designed for entrepreneurs, teams, and youth-focused initiatives.

shared.title: Shared Workspace
shared.description: A shared and creative workspace for companies and individuals, featuring 60 desks for building expertise and relationships.

meeting.title: Meeting Rooms
meeting.description: Core Istanbul offers two meeting rooms in its creative environment, fully equipped, providing comfort and privacy, accommodating 4–12 people.

training.title: Training Rooms
training.description: Dedicated training rooms for events, conferences, and training sessions, accommodating 40–80 people.

offices.title: Private Offices
offices.description: Core Istanbul offers 10 offices, fully equipped with essential supplies for entrepreneurs, accommodating 3–8 people.

cafe.title: Business Cafe
cafe.description: Core Istanbul offers a friendly space for young people by providing a specially designed café, serving hot and cold drinks with quick snacks, and seating for 30 people.

intro.title: Contact Us
